data.title: Württemberg weather in July, averages
data.meta_description: Learn more about the weather in July in Baden-Württemberg, Germany. Is it the best month to visit Baden-Württemberg? And find out where to go in July on our informative map.
data.text:
Weather in July in Baden-Württemberg

Are you planning a trip a to Baden-Württemberg in July and wondering what kind of weather to expect? This page has all the details you need.

What is the weather like in Baden-Württemberg in July?

Baden-Württemberg is a region in Germany. July in Baden-Württemberg generally has warm temperatures, with precipitation levels ranging from moderate to heavy. During July, summer is in full swing.

Temperatures

The average maximum temperatures are warm and range from 23°C in Isny im Allgäu to 27°C in Rust. Nighttime temperatures generally drop to 15°C in Rust and 13°C in Isny im Allgäu. On average, July is the warmest month of the year in Baden-Württemberg. So be prepared and pack summer clothes.

Precipitation

In July, precipitation varies across different areas. From moderate rainfall in Waghäusel with an average of 64 mm to heavy rainfall in Isny im Allgäu with 173 mm.

Average sunshine

Meanwhile, Rust enjoys close to 267 hours of sunlight. This means it's a great month if you prefer bright and sunny days.

For specific regional insights in Baden-Württemberg for July, refer to the map provided below. For an in-depth overview of the yearly weather conditions, do visit our Baden-Württemberg climate page.

Where to go in Baden-Württemberg in July

Find more information for the most popular destinations in the Baden-Württemberg on the map below. Click on a destination dot for more detailes.

Map not visible? Whoops sorry! Please refresh the page.

Legend perfect weather pleasant tolerable unpleasant poor

Perfect weather is subjective. On this map perfect weather has been defined with temperatures between 20°C and 29°C and not too much precipitation (less than 90 mm a month).

Popular destinations

What is the weather like in July for the 5 most popular destinations in Baden-Württemberg?

Rust

In July Rust generally has high temperatures with maximum daytime temperatures around 27°C, minimum nighttime temperatures around 15°C and moderate monthly rainfall. So on average the conditions are perfect that month.

Is July the best time to visit Baden-Württemberg?

We believe that July is one of the best times to visit Baden-Württemberg with overall perfect weather in Rust. However, the weather conditions may vary depending on your destination.

On average, the best time to visit Baden-Württemberg is in May, June, July, August and September with generally perfect weather in Rust. On the other hand, the weather in January, February, November and December tend to be poor.
